routes.name: find_therapist
utterances: Help me find a therapist that focuses on trauma and offers online sessions.
Help me find a therapist that works with teens and is within my budget.

Help me find a therapist that specializes in anxiety and is affordable.
Help me find a therapist that accepts insurance and is located in downtown.
Help me find a therapist that is accepting new clients and has good reviews.

Today, I feel sad and need some comfort.
Today, I feel excited about starting a new project.
Today, I feel grateful for my supportive friends.
Today, I feel a bit anxious about my upcoming presentation.
Today, I feel frustrated with my current situation.
Today, I feel relaxed and at peace.
